attributes.action: THE SENSIBLE EUROPEAN REFERENDUM  KEEP TRADE LINKS BUT STOP FUNDING THE EURO GRAVY TRAIN KEEP MONEY IN UK ECONOMY HAVE VOTE AT SAME TIME AS ELECTION
attributes.additional_details: The sensible Europe question REFERENDUM in for trade and movement of people but stop the funding of the euro gravy train keep the funding in UK for UK economy close Brussels euro HQ it is not needed WE CAN STILL HAVE EURO TRADE AND MOVEMENT OF PEOPLE AND BE OUT OF EUROPE WE MUST STOP FUNDING THE GRAVY TRAIN.TO SAVE COST LETS HAVE THE VOTE AT THE SAME TIME AND ON THE SAME BALLOT PAPER AS THE ELECTION IN 2015
